Hero.title: Mastering computer science fundamentals
Hero.text: The IO Academy is an online learning platform that provides interactive courses and projects in Computer Science to high schoolers and adults of all backgrounds.

Metadata.title: Lessons
Metadata.description: With our computer science course IO Academy gives you the knowledge and confidence you need to excel in software engineering, and more.
